description:
AJKI-04 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Mustard

Illuminate your winter wardrobe with this infallible ensemble blending mustard allure and peacock charm. Featuring a drop corner style, heavily embroidered shirt, adorned with meticulous threadwork in maroon, bright pink, leafy green, and rust colors, this vibrant piece brings forward the magic of traditional colors and artistry. Paired with a peacock green shawl, its gorgeous embroidery showcasing floral and botanical influences that dance across the fabric, creating a harmonious blend of warmth and charm, invite you to celebrate the season in style.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered front side panel with paisley left on self twill
Embroidered front side panel with paisley right on self twill
Pair of embroidered side panels right & left on self twill
Embroidered back neckline on self twill
Embroidered back motif chann on self twill
Embroidered border for front & back daman on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
Pair of embroidered bunches for sleeves on self twill
Embroidered border for front & back chaak on self twill
Embroidered shawl with 4-side border on self twill
1.5-meter wide width self twill for trouser
